《歎息橋》(Gutter)


《歎息橋》嘅英文名 Gutter，其實係引自王爾德嘅名句：
「我們都活在陰溝裡，但有些人仍然仰望星空。」
（We are all in the gutter, but some of us are looking at the stars.）


編劇 黃綺琳
導演 Fatball（李紹波）、25（楊承恩）
主演 林保怡、周家怡、衛詩雅、陳奐仁、伍詠薇、秦 沛、潘燦良、岑珈其、楊偲泳、陳健朗、談善言、黃定謙、黃溢濠、唐 寧、艾 威、凌文龍、陸駿光、劉兆銘、梁諾妍、易健兒、劉皓嵐
集數 15集

官方預告
https://youtu.be/FobCZSBZWp8


如果睇唔明:

Ep. 1-3各人視角差異懶人包
為閣下母親著想，劇透請加密最少4層

《歎息橋》嘅英文名 Gutter，其實係引自王爾德嘅名句：「我們都活在陰溝裡，但有些人仍然仰望星空。」（We are all in the gutter, but some of us are looking at the stars.）

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pnymwEOfjCY
主題曲：困局
主唱：岑寧兒
作曲：Mike Orange、岑寧兒
作詞：陳詠謙

看鐵閘 搖晃
籠內有 月光
回憶泛黃
會在盼望裡 遇見失望
行著爬著 沿路骯髒
有浪困住我 便有彼岸
誰未原諒 纏住不放
還在生 抹前塵上路
還在掙扎的思海有霧
蒙著眼 承受一生煎熬
還是困局
誰於溝渠描繪星圖 > 講Thomas
誰的衣裳藏尖刀 > 講Ken
誰人心高 > 講Joyce 誰人登高 > 講Sammy

紅色係扣返歎息橋 ; 全曲歌詞扣住主題曲名—困局
詞末四句係主角四人嘅描寫

《歎息橋》插曲 Yours Truly
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xGHwQ37JBbk

作詞：Mike Orange、黃靖
作曲：Mike Orange

I've got millions of words to say
In the dark I'm so afraid
to tell you how much I care for you

For all the promises I've made
I'm sorry I have betrayed
And it's driving me insane

But you'll have to understand
I won't even try to defend

There're words that I can't say to you right now
I'd have to keep it in me
and that's what I got to do
Till the day when I stand right in front of you
I hope you'll understand, I truly do

I'm now millions of miles away
In the dark but I'm so awake
Recalling moments I've shared with you

For all the feelings I have for you
For hiding them I'm such a fool
Now my heart is soaked in blue

And you'll have to understand
There's not much we can demand

There're words that I can't say to you right now
I'd have to keep it in me
and that's what I got to do
Till the day when I stand right in front of you
I hope you'll understand, I truly do

I'm in this attic every night and day
My loneliness just won't go away
I've hurt you now I have to pay

For every lie I had to say
I said it to keep you safe
It sounds phony but it is true

But you'll have to understand
There's not much we can demand

There're words that I can't say to you right now
I'd have to keep it in me
and that's what I got to do
Till the day when I stand right in front of you
I hope you'll understand, I truly do
